TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program, anagrams, and you!

Articles.Content:
So I was playing around a bit with the Internet Anagram Server tonight, seeing what I could generate for various terms, and I figured I'd see what it can make with Kerbal Space Program. What came out was a list full of delights. Some of the highlights include:

Paperback Solar Germ

Algebra Mappers Rock

Package Rambler Pros

Carpal Embargo Perks

Gambler Corks Appear

Karma Bagel Croppers

It got me thinking: why should I be the only one having fun with KSP anagrams? Let's see what crazy things we can turn out of our favorite KSP names!
You shouldn't be the only one! (However, it should be done in Games, which this thread now occupies.)

ok here is a few

Be Winter Just

A Broods Remoteness

Arms Tutors

Balrog speak PR cream.

OMG, err's appear black!

ROM grapples are back.

Spark racer globe amp.

Okay maybe I'm not so good at this after all.

Pace grampa Berk so rl

I suck at this lol.
